title: Posipi Stream Team Looking for active Members for rank 5s and maybe more in future.
body:
hey guys i kinda created the team all roles are open part from mid. looking for players to try something new and build synergy and team comps together. want people who are active who can play from 5pm weekdays  and anytime on Saturday ,Sunday. every game will be on stream and hopefully build up some viewers and reputation in the future. must have teamspeak or skype with a mic and willing to communicate with team. currently is 1-0 only but need the active players to continue it. the games will be streamed on twitch.tv/elimposipi.

Requirements:
Gold++
must have skype or teamspeak 
working mic
communication
Willing to learn and develope as players.

We are looking for all roles part from mid if interested feel free to leave a comment or add me in game  posipi  remeber to put a space in front of the name before adding thank you guys hope to see ya guys soon.

replies.body: Bump we will be playing tonight !! add eadweald if interested
Looking for good Mid laner and support add eadweald if interested guys or for more info
Looking for good Mid laner and support add eadweald if interested guys or for more info
Solid in support but not gold but still think I can cut it.  If you need a good support invite me for a trial game.

Will you accept S1s?

Huh I have your eadweald account added
